doc:
Tony Wright (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Wright_(actor) 0 Paul Anthony "Tony" Wright (10 December 1925 – 6 June 1986) was an English film actor. The son of actor Hugh E. Wright, he was a Rank Organisation contract player for some years. He married actress Janet Munro in 1957, though the couple were divorced in 1959. Paul_Anthony_"_Tony_"_Wright ( 10_December_1925 – 6_June_1986 ) was an_English_film_actor . The_son of actor_Hugh_E._Wright , he was a_Rank_Organisation_contract_player for some_years . He married actress_Janet_Munro in 1957 , though the_couple were_divorced in 1959 .
